div.p: tṛtīyaḥ sargaḥ |
div.div: sa devo mandarācale girijayāvalambito yugapadeva sarvartubhirasevyata | prasavāḥ kusumā- ni | arīṇāṃ vijetṛtvādanaghā acchamacāriṇo'pratihatā vā bhujataravo yasya || 1 ||

madhupānāṃ rājibhiḥ parājitamanasvinīmanasa: sumanasa: puṣpāṇi yatra tādṛśaṃ jagatsurabhe| santasya śobhāmavahat | sumanobhiḥ surabhi sāmoraṃ jagacchyiṃ dadhe iti vā yojanā | vi- plavo bādhaḥ| sphuṭitāni bhinnāni | tatānyāmravaṇāni yatra | "vibhāṣauṣadhi-' inyādi| nātra nakārasya ṇakāraḥ || 2 ||

yamena sevitā digdakṣiṇā tāmapāsya raviḥ aiḍaviḍo dhanada āśrayaḥ patiryasyāstāṃ diśamuttarāmaśiśriyatsevitavān | utkṛtānurāgasteneva | utsuko hi kāmī yathā yameneva kenacidadhiṣṭhitāṃ yuvatimutsṛjya kasyacidartheśvarasya ramaṇī pratipadyate | asumatāṃ prāṇināṃ sumatāṃ atīva śītoṣṇayorabhāvādatyantarucitām || 3 ||

tilakaistarubhedairujjvalapatrābhiśca latābhiḥ sahavartamānā giribhuvo ramyā sthitimadhāra- yan | vanāni kānanāni jalāni vā | tilakaścitrakaḥ | patralatā: patrabhaṅgāḥ | tatsa- hitāśca kāminyo manoharasthitayaḥ | vanānāmatra kāmitā pratīyate | samāsoktivaśāta

lg.l: madhurayā parapuṣṭagirā śanaiḥ savayaseva sametya madhuśriyā|
madhuliho vyathayantu malīmasāḥ smarasahā rasahāsavatīḥ striyaḥ ||10||
tadabhidhāya tamānaya satvaraṃ madhuravādini tattaditi striyaḥ |

div.p: rucirabhilāṣaḥ kāntiśca | madhuḥ puṣparasī madhuśca vasantaḥ | avatīrṇamanobhava- tvātparavatīḥ paratantrāḥ || 5 ||

madhuliho bhramarāsteṣāṃ saṃhatirasukhāyata sukhamanvabhūt | sukhādibhyaḥ karṭavedanāyāṃ kyaṅ | kutaḥ | kusumauṣadhisaṃbandhino rasasya saṃgrahaḥ pānaṃ tena susthitā śobhanamāsthitā| uktaṃ ca-'anekaraso'bhyavahāro rasāyanam' iti ||6||
"varojāmātā ca ||||kusumitā rajasvalā api priyāḥprītihetavaḥ | madanaśca kāmaḥ| parabhṛtāḥ pareṇa poṣitāḥ pṛthagjanā api | madana nāditā mukharīkṛtāḥ ṣaṭpadā bhramarā viṭāśca yābhistāḥ|| 9 ||

madhuretyādiviśeṣakam | ratirasena visṛṣṭāyāḥ savayaso vaca| nenāgate priyatame viṣaye āyataṃ mānaṃ muścanti yāstathāvidhā yoṣito babhūvuḥ | mādhavī atimuktakalatā| malīmasāḥ pāpāḥ | smarasya sahā: samucitāḥ | taruṇīrityarthaḥ ||10||

paśmabhiḥ kesaraiḥ karālatā vyāptirbhāsuratvaṃ vā | śucitayāpyupalakṣito yadeṣa stabakastāpa- yati tadayuktam | viśadātmatvātparopatāpanābhāvāt | citayā pravṛddhayā| pakṣmāṇi netralo- mānyapi | karālaṃ bhīṣaṇamapi | madhu madyamapi || 11 ||
tattasmāttattadbahuvidhamuktvā ta dayitaṃ satvaramānaya | na vayaṃ kālakṣepasahiṣṇava iti bhāvaḥ ||12||
paṅkajabījaṃ padmākṣaḥ|
vyavaghirācchādanam | striyā virahe sati vaghayogakṛto ghātukāḥ | strīhananāca madyapānaprā- galbhyaṃ malinātmanāṃ kiyat || 13 ||

jaḍatayā maunena na tyaktāḥ | bāliśatayā ca maugdhyena na sahitā iti virodhaḥ | jaḍatayā śaityenānapākṛtāḥ | navāni ca tānyaliśa- tāni tairanvitāḥ| ||||||riṇā|| ciryasyā iti cārthadvāreṇa viśeṣaṇam || 14 ||
caramaḥ paścimaḥ | saṃpuṭo dvayam | anugiraṃ girisamīpe | 'gireśca senakasya' iti ṭaca | rase madhuni mano yasya saḥ| samanāda tulyadhvaniṃ kṛtvā ||16||
kusumameva koṣaścaṣakaṃ tameva taronīyakabhūtasyārpayituṃ latā vivalitā saṃmukhaṃ parivṛttā| madhu makarandaḥ surā ca| balī haladharaḥ | tāpaḥ kāmajvaro'pi ||18||
kesarāṇi bakulānyeva | ketūnāṃ dhvajānāṃ śatāni yasmin || 19 ||
madhorvasantasya saṃgamāniśayā mukhe prārambhe kaluṣatā nāpi na prāptā | tadā diśāmatiśayena vaiśadyāt | aniśaṃ sadā yāpitamativāhitaṃ mānaṃ parimāṇaṃ

1| 'sarasa-mantha-rata-amara-sādara-bhrama-rasat-jalayā' iti jaladhidevatāpakṣe chedaḥ, tṛ-| tīyaikavacanāntaṃ ca padama; 'sarasa-manthara-tāmarasa-ādara-bhramara-sajja-layā' iti nalinī- pakṣe chedaḥ, prathamaikavacanāntaṃ ca padam|

lg.l: smarasakhasya padaṃ surabheriva stanavatī dadhatī samamīmanat |

div.p: dairghya yayā | vasante rātrīṇāṃ tānavotpatteḥ | kāminī dvitīyakā minyā kṛtaśamana vinatvā- ccireṇāpi samāgate preyasi na vadane kāluṣyamāpnoti madyasaṃparkāt | madhu madyamapi | mā- no'bhimāno'pi || 20||
sarasijānāmurasimadhye bhramarailŏṣamavasthitaṃ sukhaṃ viśrāntam | uttaracchadaḥ pracchadapaṭa: | sajānibhiḥ sabhāyaḥ | 'jāyāyā niṅ' || 21 ||

kuṭamitā- khyena ceṣṭitena manaḥ kāntasya vadhūrahṛta samāvarjayat | 'prāṇeśagāḍhabhujapāśanipīḍitānā- muddāmaharṣabharanirbharamānasānām | hī duḥkhayasyalamalaṃ dṛḍhamūḍhavākyaiḥ saukhye'pi duḥkha iva kuṭṭamitaṃ vadanti' || 22 ||
stanavato yuvatiḥ | sā smarasyāsī sakheti vasantasya saṃsthitimiva samamīmanatsaṃmānayāmāsa | yato navau yavasyāvayava ekadeśo'ṅkara evā- bharaṇaṃ yatra tādṛśīṃ śriyaṃ dhārayantī || 23 ||

ahāryā girayasteṣāṃ taṭā:] smṛtibhūvaḥ kāmasya śaktarupacayaṃ kurvantaḥ | tathā pathikānāṃ hananaṃ kurvāṇasya kusumeṣoḥ śaktipo- ṣaṇaṃ prati sahakāritā sahāyatvamudavahan | sahakāriṇoṃ hiṃ pratyayāḥ prakriyāntarasyopā- dānabhūtasya kārya prati śaktimupacinvanti bījasyeva jalādayaḥ | anavamāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ | mādhavo vasantaḥ || 24 ||
janā ratikrīḍārasena vyākulā babhūvuḥ | kaṅkaṭitaiḥ sasaṃ- nāhaiḥ || 25||
"kiṃjalkāsvādanena kalairmadhurairasakalaiścāvyaktaśrutibhiralinā ravaiścampa kākhyaṃ kusumaṃ samudgatamadanā yoṣitaścakāra || 26 ||
rabhasā tvarā | madhukarā evāñjana-

lg.l: bhramarayugmamavekṣya na kā priyairyuvatayo bata yogamupāyayuḥ || 28 ||
suravadhūmiva vīkṣya manobhuvo'navaśamā vaśamāśu madhau yayuḥ || 32||
sphuṭadaśokamudīkṣya tadutsukā na kamitā kamitāramalaṃ vadhūḥ || 34||

div.p: mayaṃ vaśīkaraṇaprakāracūrṇam | nijābhirvadhūbhirjavena dhūtastiraskṛta: śarīraśramo yeṣām || 27 ||
śaivalena śevālena satī śobhanā, śaivaiśca śivabhaktairlasantī śrīryasyāḥ | bateti vismaye || 28 ||

atimuktakavratatayo na tatayogā guṇaśrīryāsāṃ tādṛśyo nābhavan | saṃvistīrṇaguṇaśrīyogā babhūvurityarthaḥ | prakaṭapatralatāḥ śākhā evābharaṇaṃ tenojjvalā rabhyāḥ | patralatābhirābharaṇeścojjvalā vitataguṇaśobhāśca yoṣito bhavanti || 29 ||
kamitā kāntaḥ | adadaradvibheda | 'atsmṛhatvaraprathamradastaspaśām' ityabhyāsakārya- madantādeśaḥ | rāgo'nuraktirapi | karaḥ pāṇirapi || 30 ||
palāśa: kiṃśukaḥ | tatra bhramarāṇāṃ saṃhatiścapalā svāmabhikhyāmāvirabībhavatprakaṭīcakāra | vibhramaḥ sadṛśaḥ || 31 ||

anavaściraprarūḍhaḥ śamo yeṣāṃ te munayaḥ kāmasya vaśaṃ yayuḥ | animiṣairanimī- ladbhirakṣibhirālokito vīnāṃ pakṣiṇāṃ bhramarāṇāṃ bhramo yasyām | animiṣaścākṣṇorda- śanasya vilāso yasyāḥ | navamālikā saptalā| anavamaṃ cotkṛṣṭamalikaṃ lalāṭa yasyāḥ || 32 ||
bhīravo yoṣitaḥ | tāsāṃ janaḥ samadatvādasamaṃ dolanavibhramaṃ dolā- vilāsaṃ na nānvabhavat, api tu anubhūtavāneva | parimṛṣṭaṃ spṛṣṭam || 33 ||
adīdipa- diti dīpanaṃ prabodhanaṃ dahanaṃ ca | śikhī vahniḥ | tadvattena ca piṅgalaṃ kapiśam | vadhaḥ kamitāraṃ kāmukaṃ na kaṃ itā kaṃ na prāptā | nāsau vallabho babhūva yaḥ priyayā na yukta
[iti vasantaḥ]

lg.l: galati dhāma kimetaditi bhramaṃ bhṛtavatītavatī janatā lamam || 39 ||

div.p: ityarthaḥ || 34 ||
'suvarṇaśṛṅkhalābaddho nānāratnavibhūṣitaḥ | lalāṭalambyalaṃkāraścaṭulā- tilakaḥ smṛtaḥ ||' raso makarando jalaṃ vā | narasārthahṛtsarvajanamanoramā || 35 ||
śucirāṣāḍho māsaḥ | āpnutiḥ snānam | vartasitā śekharīkṛtā mallikā kusumabhedo yā- bhiryāsāṃ vā | 'vaṣṭi bhāgurirallopamavāpyorupasargayoḥ' ityavaśabdākāralopaḥ || 36 ||

karāḥ pāṇayo'pi | tāpaḥ khedo'pi | mānaṃ daiya̍mabhimānaśca | cirayāyīni dināni praiṣmikā vāsarāḥ | atra tigmaruceḥ kakubhāṃ ca kāmitā pratīyate | liṅgaviśeṣopādā- nāt | yathā--'sarale saha vāsaraśriyā nibhṛtaṃ kāpi gataḥ sa bhāskaraḥ | vada tena vinā- bjinī kathaṃ kṣaṇadāmadya natāṅgi neṣyati ||' iti | evaṃ dinaśriyo'pi nāyikātvapra- tīto yathoktameva saṃbhavatīti dayitayetyupamānapadamapuṣṭārthamiti sahṛdayāḥ || 37 ||
priyatamasahitāpi kṛśāṅgī virahiṇyāḥ sthitimitā prāptā | jalārdā jalanutaṃ vastram | atimitākṣarā svalpavarṇā || 38 ||
ṭaṅkanikuṃṭṭanena śastrakāhatyā ghaṭitaṃ calitam | raviḥ kila parā priyatamānurodhana duḥsahatara svadhāma tvaṣṭuṣṭaṅkana śātayāmāsa | janatā klama| mitavatī gatā || 39 ||
dīpikā lohādimayī dīpādhārabhūtā yaṣṭirapi | mallikā

1| kāvyaprakāśadaśamollāsopānte'pi 'spṛśati tigmarucau kakubhaḥ karaiḥ-' ityā- yatratyameva padyamudāhṛtya atra tigmaruceḥ kakubhāṃ ca---ki dayitayeti svaśabdopādānena' ityuktamasti| parikarālaṃkāraprakaraṇānantaraṃ ca kāvyaprakāśaśeṣo'nenaiva haravijayaṭī- kākā rājānakālakena pūrita ityuktameva prāk| ata evātra ṭīkāyāṃ kāvyaprakāśe cāsminpadye samānameva dūṣaṇodbhāvanam |
iti grīṣmaḥ

lg.l: sa kṛtapānthavadhūjanavepathū rasamayaḥ samayaḥ sma vijṛmbhate || 43||

div.p: tailabhājanamapi | ghano'naghaśca nādaḥ kvaṇitaṃ yeṣām || 40 ||
bandhuro rucira: saurabhapra- saro yasya tadbhāvaḥ saratā vātena dhṛtā | peṭakaḥ samūhaḥ | pāṭala:: puṣpabhedaḥ | saṃpaṭā mukulāḥ || 41 ||
itīva ruṣā pratikatukāmaṃ śirīṣaṃ nāma kusumamīkṣitaṃ sadālokita- mātraṃ sat virahiṇī śokamalambhayatprāpayāmāsa | sarasaḥ pratyagro hāsa udbhedo yeṣām || 42 ||
giriśo haraḥ | 'girau ḍaśchandasi' iti pratyayadvāreṇa cchandasi niyamitatvā- giriśaśabdasya bhāṣāyāṃ prayogaḥ pramādajaḥ | rasaḥ salilaṃ rāgaśca | tanmayaḥ samayo varṣā- rātraḥ || 43 ||
payodharāṇāṃ dhoraṇī patiḥ | kimu bhuvi rajo nāśamayaditi nañ atra sāmarthyalabhyaḥ || 44 ||
saṃvananaṃ vaśīkaraṇam | atanuḥ kāmaḥ | avāsiṣurvavuḥ || 45 ||
saninādāḥ payomuco yatra tasminkāle mayūreṇa nṛttavyasanavatā sthitam | navaiścandrakaiḥ picchailāñchitā lakṣitā, candrasya ca kalayā āñchitā saṃgatā || 46 ||
āntara- mārgo gahanaḥ pradeśaḥ | tadgatāṃ śriyaṃ vanabhuvo'vahan | jātirmālatī tayā śarīraruka svarū-

lg.l: ka iva te'nukṛtorjitabhūbhṛtā ghanacayena ca ye na vaśīkatāḥ || 50 ||
vikira vāri vilolaya vidyuto nabhasi garna tiraskuru diktaṭān |

div.p: paśobhā prakaṭā yāsām| tathā jātayaḥ śuddhavikṛtabhedenāṣṭādaśa ṣāḍjīṣaḍjamadhyamadhyamāpra- bhṛtayaḥ | tatsvarūpasyeva ca rugyāsām | tāsāmeva ca viśeṣo'ntaramārgoṃ bhavati | dviśra- tyadhikayoniṣādagāndhārayoryathākrama kākalyantarasvarasaṃjñatvakalpanāt | kavalanā grāsaḥ | tadartha valanā paribhramaṇam || 47 ||
mekalo vindhyaḥ | tena meghasya sāmyamasitavarṇa- tvāt | acirāciḥ saudāmanī| ānatayā puna:punarullasanena dausthityamasmāsu na jana- yitavyamityāśayena prahvayā || 48 ||
alakānāṃ tāṇḍavikainaitakaiḥ || 49 ||

śakradha- numanohareṇa, gavalasya ca mahiṣaśṛṅgasya śyāmatayā śobhāṃ gṛhṇatā ca, ghanānāṃ cayena bhūbhṛteva caturaṃ kṛtvā na ye vaśīkṛtāste ka iva janāḥ | na kecit | rājā punaranargha- ratnayogena sphuritendradhanuryo hārastadvān caturaṅgasya balasya hastyaśvarathapattilakṣaṇasya sai- nyasya śobhāṃ kalayati || 50 ||

harigopā indragopākhyāḥ prāṇinaḥ harigopaśca go- parūpadhārī viṣṇuḥ | vrajo gavāṃ nivāsaḥ | añcitā śreṣṭhā lāṅgalikā auṣadhi- viśeṣo yatra | añcitaśca pūjito lāgalī haladharo yatra | anavo reṇuścirasaṃcitaṃ rajaḥ || 51 ||

atanoḥ kāmasya bahulāyāśca śriya ālayatvaṃ kalayatā gṛhṇatā kuṭajākhyakusuma- nicayena nakṣatragaṇavadācaritam | nabhasi śrāvaṇe'ntarikṣe ca | candrākārairdalaiḥ pallavaiḥ, candrasya ca dalena khaṇḍenojjvale rucire || 52 ||

vāri vikira jalaṃ vikiranityā- dikamācaran jalado viyutāṃ viyoginīṃ na navaśām, api tvāyattāmeva cakāra | vikire- tyādau 'samuccaye'nyatarasyām' iti loṭ | hirādeśaśca | ācaraniti sāmānyavacanasyānu- prayogaḥ 'samuccaye sāmānyavacanasya' iti || 53 ||
nigṛhanena sthitimata: sukhitān

lg.l: vyadhita hāri kadambamapi striyaḥ smaravaśā ravaśāliśilīmukham ||15||
ghanatamasyabalāḥ samavartinā dadṛśire virahaglapitā na yāḥ |

div.p: iti varṣāḥ
itthamiva ravaistaruṇānambudo'bhyadhyāt | abhimato'tīvābhipretaḥ | samāgamakāraṇatvāt ||54 ||
alātamulmukam | tatsadṛśī taḍidāvirabhavatprakaṭībabhūva | samavartī yamaḥ ||56||
āmalaistarubhedaiḥ kandalaiśca latāviśeṣaiḥ satī śobhanā śrīryāsām | amalaiśca kandaibisairanyairvā mūlairlasantī śrīryāsām | girimallikā kuṭajam | tacchabalitatvābha- marairvalitā veṣṭitāḥ || 57 ||
navo dhūrgataśca paradhārādhirūṭa: kāmo yāsāṃ tathāvidhā vadhūrabhrapavanaścakāraiva | kuṭajādayo vārṣikāḥ kusumaviśeṣāḥ || 58 ||

mālatīkusuma- meva mudgaraḥ praharaṇaviśeṣaḥ | sa eva smṛtibhuvaḥ sakāśādāgatena apaścimena prahārāntarā- pekṣiṇā prahāreṇa mūrchitā yoṣitaścakāra | mālatīkusumameva kāmasya mudgara iti tu na yuktam | mudgaraśabdasyātra sāpekṣatayā samāsāprasaṅgāt | madarase madajanake madhunyādaraḥ saṃmramo yeṣāṃ tathāvidhāḥ sāravāśca bhramarā yasmin || 59 ||

āyataṃ sujalatāmadhyaṃ | priyatamā kamīpsitaṃ priyaṃ nānayat | sarvameva nijā vadhaḥ pariṣasvaje | hariraśvaḥ | rado dantaḥ | kālikā meghapatiḥ, aśvānāṃ vayovijñānacihnaṃ ca | māna eva tamaḥ | māli- nyahetutvāt || 60 ||
śaradā hetunā mudamāśrito janaḥ sutarāṃ damasya śāntelacanama

lg.l: sthagayituṃ pratikūlavilokanāḥ kusumitāḥ kakubho nu viyoginām |

div.p: karot | apaghanā megharahitā | apaghanāścāṅgāni | hṛdayahāriśobho nava iṣa āśvayujo yasyām | hṛdayanandanaśca śobhano veṣo yasyāḥ | veṣo veśa ākalpa ityarthāntaram || 61 ||

kamalānāṃ komalaṃ kuḍamalaṃ janānāṃ haste yatra tadbhāvaṃ dadhatīṃ śriyaṃ śaradivasā ahire dadhuḥ | turagā iva | tairapi kamalahastā śrīruhyate | tatsaṃnidhau śriyaḥ sthānāt | kaṃ jalaṃ śiraśca dhārayantīti kaṃdharā jalabhṛto grīvāśca | 'saṃjñāyāṃ bhṛtavṛjidhārisahitapidamaḥ' iti khac ||62 ||
udārayā mudā yuktamitīva cintayajjalajamātapasevāsaspṛhaṃ vyakasat || 63 ||
candrakai rājitāḥ śobhitāstaiścitraiḥ śikhaṇḍibhirmayūrai rucirā rucirnāla- bhyata | citraśikhaṇḍinaśca saptarṣayaḥ | taiścandrakarairajitairapi niśāpagame na dīpyate || 64 ||
īyivat gatam | samamihāraḥ paunaḥpunyam | avikalaṃ samagram || 65 ||

tāpavighātasya viparyayo'nyathātvamatrāparighātaḥ | tatsthityā vilakṣatā trapā | ayu- kchadāḥ saptacchadāsteṣāṃ kānanaiḥ | ayukchadakānāṃ vā ānanairmukhai rasamahāsaṃ kṛtvā niya- tamambudā ahāsiṣata | vayamadhunā tāpopaghātapaṭavaḥ, na yūyamitīva vikasvaratvena hasitā ityarthaḥ | hāso vikāso hasanaṃ ca| ahāsiṣatetyupadhāvṛddhirātmanepada viṣayatvācciṇva- dbhāvaprasaṅgācca | tasmātkānanakarṭako'samo hāso yatra tathā kṛtvā aha kaṣṭaṃ āsiṣate- ti yojyam || 66 ||
candrāṃśavo bhramarāṇāṃ kumudeṣu dalayantraṇaṃ patrabandhamadalayanbi- bhiduḥ | davathuḥ saṃtāpaḥ || 67 ||
adhikastavanato ramyatayā bahalastutibhājo vanataḥ
kānanājjalādvā kamalarajo vātānāṃ samūhaḥ | kusumitatvādviruddhadarśanā diśaḥ pidhātu- miva | kusumitā rajasvalā api | nuśabda ivārthe || 68 ||
ghanānāṃ jālasya tiraskṛ- tirantardhānaṃ yatra tasyāṃ śaradi nadītaṭarjaghanajā kāntiratanyata | śakunayaḥ khagāḥ || 69 ||

ucchrasanmadhu makarandaṃ yatra, karoraiśca tarubhedaiścitā vyāptā sthitiryasya tādṛśaṃ vanaṃ gṛhītavatāṃ bhramarāṇāmalasatā kvacinnāsīt | kasumamapyucchasadvikasvaraṃ madhukarībhyaśca racita sthiti kṛtāvasthānam | ṛtuḥ prāpto'sya ārtavam | 'ṛtoraṇa' ityaṇa | lasatāṃ krīḍatām || 70 ||

vitathā niṣphalā ākhyā pratotiryeṣāṃ tadbhāvo bāṇākhyakasumasa- mahena śaratsaṃbandhinā dhṛtaḥ | viyogimanobhedanāt | bāṇāśca śarāḥ sūkṣmaśaravyabhedakā vitathapratītayo na bhavanti | śarā asanāśca tarubhedāḥ śarāsanaṃ ca dhanuḥ | alavaṃ prabhūtaṃ tāpaṃ karoti yastena || 71 ||

rasaḥ pāradaṃ tatkriyā dhātuvādastayeva śaracchyiā sthitiravāpi padaṃ nibaddham | āgamaḥ pravṛttiḥ śāstrasaṃpradāyaśca | tārā nakṣatrāṇi tāraṃ ca rūpyam | kālikā kalako vyājaśca (?) tāmrādikṛtaḥ | candraḥ śaśī suvarṇa ca | kamalāni padmāni, kamalā ca lakṣmīḥ || 72 ||
kaṇiśaṃ sasyamañjarī | kalamaḥ śāli- bhedaḥ | kalī manoharo mandraśca yo ravastenākulaṃ kṛtvā || 73 ||
navaṃ saro viloḍayituṃ haṃsānāṃ gaṇasyāvasaraḥ prasaṅgaścirādabhūt | kuṭumbinyaḥ priyā haṃsyaḥ || 74 ||
niṣku- ṭajāḥ kuṭajarahitāḥ | kuṭajānāṃ vārṣikatvāt | niṣkuṭā gṛhārāmāstebhyaśca jātāḥ |

lg.l: stanamiva stabakaṃ vratatiḥ stravannijarasaṃ jarasaṃ vyatipetuṣī || 76 ||

div.p: [iti śarat ]
asamo'nanyasadṛśaḥ | śaśiprabhā yoṣito'pi | śaśinaḥ prabhā yāsāmiti kṛtvā || 75 ||

apāyayatpāyayāmāsa | kvacit 'adhāpayat' iti pāṭhaḥ | tatra 'pādiṣu dheṭa upasaṃkhyānam' iti 'nigaraṇa-' iti prāptasya parasmaipadasya niṣedhātkabhiprāye kriyā- phale 'ṇicaśca' iti taṅ | raso madhu stanyaṃ ca | jarasaṃ vyatipatuṣī jarāmatikāntā | 'jarāyā jarasanyatarasyām' iti jaras || 76 ||
sarabhasenātmanā hetunā puraḥsarāsu sārasīṣu anurāgabhareṇa pūritā ye sārasā lakṣmaṇāstairmukharitaṃ saro bhramarāṇāṃ vaṇatāṃ sarasatvamakarot | raso rāgaḥ || 77 ||

tālāḥ karayoḥ parasparamabhighātāḥ | teṣāṃ layaḥ śobhā śleṣo vā | gītameva gītakaṃ gānam | gītakaṃ madrakādiviśiṣṭaṃ gītaṃ prakaṭatālalayaṃ bhavati | tatra tālāścañcapuṭacācapuṭādayaḥ | teṣāṃ layo drutamadhyavilambitabhedena tridhā kālāntarānuvṛttiḥ | uktaṃ ca-'tāla: kālāntarasthāyī drutamadhyavilambitaḥ | tridhā laya iti prokto badarāmalabilvavat ||' iti | pracure sasye raso yasya | jighatsatastadevāttu- micchataḥ || 78 ||
samadaḥ pratigajo'treti bhrāntyā kṣubhitatā kṣobhastayā vyāptāna- nilaḥ kuñjarānakarot || 79 ||
himaṛtāvityatra 'ṛtyakaḥ' iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ | karṇikā bījakoṣaḥ karṇābharaṇaṃ ca | karṇau ca śrotre | vimalitā mṛditā dhavalitā ca | ata evālināṃ tāpakṛt || 80||
śītabādhabhayenārtayeva latayā sāliṅganaḥ kṛtastaruḥ

lg.l: abhimukha valati sma dhutasphuratkaratalā ratalālasayā vadhūḥ || 82 ||

div.p: [iti hemantaḥ ]

lg.l: samaya eva guṇo'pyupayujyate saparirambharuciṃ dayitaṃ striyāḥ | |
tyajati kaḥ prakṛtopakṛti janaḥ sapadi nāpadi nāma malīmasaḥ ||5||
aliramaṃsta mahattapasaḥ phalaṃ navalavaṅgalavaṃ gahane gireḥ || 89||

div.p: śuśubhe | caturayā prauḍhayā || 81 ||
rate lālasā ruciryasyāḥ || 82 ||
nāsti karā- ṇāmuṣṇimā saṃtāpo yasya tādṛśo gopatiraṃśumānyatra || 83 ||
ghanasāraṃ karpūram | mu| khāni vadanānyapi | anavaraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ || 84 ||
haimaṃ tuhinasaṃbandhi | kamalākaraḥ śrī- prado'pi | āpadi malina: ko nāma prakarṣeṇa kṛtopakāramapi na muñcati | 'praṇayapra- kṛti' iti pāṭhe snehakāraṇamityarthaḥ || 85 ||
kaṇatāṃ bhramarāṇāṃ paṅyābhivyāptatvādi- tthamiva kundaṃ tapasi māghe'bhyadhāt | hasadvikasat || 86 ||
himartārudayāt aśa- nairamandaṃ aṅganā udakaṇṭhiṣata sotkaṇṭhā jātāḥ | lavaṅgaṃ puṣpabhedaḥ | araśanaiḥ śītava| śānmekhalāśanyaiḥ || 87 ||
phalinī priyaṃgulatā | sādhuḥ śreṣṭhaḥ | madhuvratā bhramarā: || 88 ||

girigahane bhramaro lavaṅgasya lavamāśritastapaso māghasya phalaṃ tamevājñāsīt | girigahanasthaśca munistapaso vratasya phalaṃ dvandvasahiṣṇutādi samanubhavati | prasavo ja- nmāpi | saurabhaṃ yaśo'pi || 89 ||
kṣaṇadā rātriḥ| tasyāḥ suratotsave kṣamatvaṃ dogha-

lg.l: smṛtibhuvā hṛdi śalya ivārpite dadhati dāyamatīva ca khādire |

div.p: iti śrībālabṛhaspatyanujīvino vāgīśvarāṅkasya vidyādhipatyaparanānno mahākave rājānaka- śrīratnākarasya kṛtau ratnāṅke haravijaye mahākāvye ṛtuvarṇano nāma tṛtīyaḥ sargaḥ|
taratvāt || 90 ||
rajanyeva rākṣasī tayā ca kā yoṣito nāvacakhādire | sarvā eva prastāḥ | khādiraṃ śalyaṃ khadiradārumayaḥ kīlakaḥ || 91 ||

nāsti lavaśchedo yasyā- stādṛśī līlā yasya tadbhāvo yoṣitāmāsīt | asamahāsamasādhāraṇahasitaṃ rataṃ nidhu- vanaṃ yasyāṃ sā | madhunā puṣparasena | saratā pravahatā | kṛtaḥ ṣaṭpadīnāṃ rasamaho rāgo- tsavo yayā sā lavalīnāma latā ca śuśubhe || 92 ||

'dayitaṃ prati na kopo yuktaḥ, ta- mānaya tvam' ityāśayena yoṣidanavame śreṣṭhe mandarasya sānuni āliṃ gatā sakhī jagāma | navamapūrva amandarasā bahalānurāgā anunītiḥ prārthanā yatra tathā kṛtvā ca tena āli- ṅgatā saṃpariṣvajamānena sā prasāditā ||93 ||
sthalīṣu vikasitā amalā: kesarāgā bakulataravo yasya taṃ giriṃ draṣṭuṃ sarāgamalake gaurī spṛśannīśvaro viniryayau | lulite ||| kuṭilīkṛte || 94 ||
iti rājānakajayānakasūnoralakasya kṛtau haravijayaviṣamapado- iyote tṛtīyaḥ sargaḥ ||
